page.title: 17INTERVIEWS
page.content: {INTERVIEWS OF PEOPLE IN ASHINGTON Q. Does the sight of the pit Workshops put you off this area? {A. No, they do not put us off this {area as you don't see them from the {house because of the long Gardens. Q. What is the least thing you like about Ashington? {A. Em, the swimming baths are of poor {quality, and there are too many pubs {and clubs. Q. If you could do any improvements on Ashington what would you do? {A. The first thing I would do is to {make more open places and spaces for {the kids to play in,then I would open {up the cinemas, but the best {improvement I could make would be to {open a Garden Centre. A. If you had the choice to knock anything down or demolish anything what would it be?
